query:
SELECT 
  sector, 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN sampleData IS NOT NULL AND sampleData != '[]' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_samples,
  SUM(CASE WHEN screenshotUrls IS NOT NULL AND screenshotUrls != '[]' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_screenshots,
  SUM(CASE WHEN sourceUrl IS NOT NULL AND sourceUrl != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_source,
  SUM(CASE WHEN threatActor IS NOT NULL AND threatActor != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_actor
FROM leaks 
GROUP BY sector 
ORDER BY total DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3yaEUUPpH7u5Dce.6de1e535cf2b --database huuT6g8hnnLTgdYvaqdH49 --execute 
SELECT 
  sector, 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN sampleData IS NOT NULL AND sampleData != '[]' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_samples,
  SUM(CASE WHEN screenshotUrls IS NOT NULL AND screenshotUrls != '[]' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_screenshots,
  SUM(CASE WHEN sourceUrl IS NOT NULL AND sourceUrl != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_source,
  SUM(CASE WHEN threatActor IS NOT NULL AND threatActor != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_actor
FROM leaks 
GROUP BY sector 
ORDER BY total DESC;
